casebody.data:
State
v.
Jimmy Lee Gann 243P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2016

David Weiss, Attorney at Law, For Gann, Jimmy Lee.

Teresa M. Postell Assistant Attorney General, Mr. Todd Williams, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of June 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of June 2016."
